header.title: Build modern interfaces with the Gravity design system and libraries

items.item1: If you want to find out our future plans, please check out the recently updated roadmap section.
items.item2: We continue to improve our templates section and have added the Remix template. If you need other templates, don’t hesitate to create an issue.
items.item3: We added templates for popular frameworks (CRA, Next.js, Vite) and redesigned templates section. Now it’s even easier to start using our framework in your project.

feature1.title: Built on real-life experience
feature1.description: Conceived as an in-house solution in response to real developers' needs, we released Gravity to the open-source community.

feature2.title: First class design
feature2.description: Experienced designers curate the look of our libraries, ensuring that components are stylish and consistent, with support for dark mode and high-contrast themes.

feature3.title: An evolving ecosystem
feature3.description: Regular feedback from our community of developers allows us to continuously improve our libraries, and break compatibility only when necessary.

items.item1: Date Components: New library for working with date and time
items.item7: UIKit: emoji picker, color picker, label input and range input components
